Title: Christmas Comes But Once a Year
Plot: The agency's Christmas party is nearly spoiled by the late arrival of a surprise and not-so-welcome visitor.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Joel Murray, Deborah Lacey, Alexa Alemanni, Matt Long, Blake Bashoff, Cara Buono, John Aylward, Darren Pettie, Peyton List, Laura Regan, Nora Zehetner, Beth Hall, Marten Holden Weiner
